page.title: 16Grass Royal School: Yeovil.
page.content: {Grass Royal School}first opened in 1974 with 350 children and by 1975 there were 520 because Reckleford Junior School closed down. The present number is 343. There are a number of activities for the children during school time-Language, Music, Drama, Art and Craft, Maths, Computers, Science, Religious Education and Physical Education. There are also some clubs after school-Drama, Choir, Country Dancing, Football, Netball, Gymnastics and Orchestra. There are 34 people employed and some mothers come and help with sewing. Grass Royal got it's name because when it was grassland it was owned by Queen Victoria.
